title: Belleville
content:
I'm not a big fan of italic pixel fonts, but this one was just begging for some italics.   
   
It could benefit from the "gray" treatment, but I'm still having too much fun with the notchy look of "traditional" pixel fonts to give up developing them.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414071557im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/26588.gif)
author: tyleryoung
